title: How to decompress file encrypt lua
content:
I recently decrypted a mobile game, after decrypting xxtea and luajit I got strange encryption file, it was an extra layer of encryption before finding the original .lua file content. I'm very confused because I haven't encountered this type of encryption before, please help confirm the encryption type through the attached file. https://www.mediafire.com/file/zxbrsoc2qn97rs6/config.skill_enc/file

So file: https://www.mediafire.com/file/uvgq0v90w78himf/libcocos2dlua.so/file

Apk: https://www.mediafire.com/file/sw636d3iqtmnbqq/luagame.apk/file

comments.text: If that's an xxtea-decrypted file then the decrypting process for its contents probably happens in one of the .lua files rather than in the .so binary; you should share the decrypted files, too.
please do not post a picture of text ... post the text instead
@jsotola Sorry for the inconvenience, as the content of the file is too long to post, so please download the attachment: mediafire.com/file/zxbrsoc2qn97rs6/config.skill_enc/file
what are you talking about? ... it's only two lines of text in the picture ... it is not easily readable
@jsotola that's an illustration, you can download the text file to see the full content, I've attached the text file download link above
